articles.author: Oksana Pyzik
articles.title: Tropical forests face ‘massive leaf death’ from global heating, study finds - The Guardian
articles.description: Some kinds of tree leaf could become too hot to be able to conduct photosynthesis, researchers warn
articles.content:
Tropical forests could become so hot that some kinds of leaves will no longer be able to conduct photosynthesis, according to a study published in the journal Nature.

articles.title: Broken Sword 6 announced, plus 4K remaster of Broken Sword 1 - Polygon
articles.description: Revolution Software’s point-and-click games return on PC, console, and mobile, with sixth adventure Parzival’s Stone and new version of Shadow of the Templars.
articles.content: Charles Cecils point-and-click games return after a decade away

articles.title: Proton transport through nanoscale corrugations in two-dimensional crystals - Nature.com
articles.description: A study using high-resolution scanning electrochemical cell microscopy attributes proton permeation through defect-free graphene and hexagonal boron nitride to transport across areas of the structure that are under strain.

articles.title: Man Utd takeover LIVE: Sheikh Jassim 'WINS' takeover race, keeper completes medical, Mbappe boost - The Mirror
articles.description: After months and months of speculation, the latest claims over the future of Manchester United suggest that Sheikh Jassim will take over the club in a £6bn purchase to be ratified soon, with his takeover complete at the start of October.
articles.content:
